title: 'New York Times' Upheaval: Is This A Barack Vs. Hillary Moment?
teaser: The New York Times has fired Jill Abramson, making Dean Baquet the paper's first African-American executive editor. The move has sparked a debate about newsroom diversity and 'editing while female.'
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
